name: PixelArt Virtual Gallery
description:
I made this game for my Community event (Pixel Battle), every month the game will be an update:

Pixel Battle:

This event will be held once a month, the idea is that people who want to learn or are starting in pixel art participate, so they can practice together in a dynamic and fun way

All creations will be included in the pixel gallery of the community, the winners will have their publication in the hall of fame.

Normally the battles will be focused on 16x16, 32x32, 24x24 assets. Because these are the ideal sizes to practice in quick mode and are the sizes that are usually used for video games or icons, etc.

The battles consist of creating a sprite that follows the given theme, you have total freedom in the type of sprite you want to create, that is, it can be a character, an object, whatever you want.

Rules:

 

-Not NSFW material

 

-Use the decided canvas size

 

- Use the established color palette

 

-Follow the decided theme.

 

-Share by Discord the screen while doing the battle

 

-HAVE FUN

 

-Time limit 15 min

You can use the program you want, I will comment while you compete at my twitch channel.

https://www.twitch.tv/gabus19
